Gnome guards are gnome warriors in and around the Tree Gnome Stronghold, including in the Grand Tree. They have either a halberd or a sword and shield equipped. They have relatively high Hitpoints for their level and their attacks aren't very accurate.

[[File:Gnome guard chathead.png|left]]
'''Gnome guards''' are [[gnome]] warriors in and around the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]], including in the [[Grand Tree]]. They have either a halberd or a sword and shield equipped. They have relatively high Hitpoints for their level and their attacks aren't very accurate.
